Each piece is hand embellished,stretched on a 1.5" x 1.5" wooden frame, and printed sides. Arrives "ready to hang" with pre-attached mounting hooks.

name: Ice Cream Canvas Print
description:
Trukas Ice Cream from the series Trukas By Isa Zapata™. Trukas is series of colorful and unique characters with positive messages; perfect to bring happiness and good vibes to any space.

Hand embellished giclee print on a premium canvas with matte finish, stretched on a 1.5" x 1.5" wooden frame, stretcher bars and printed sides. Arrives "ready to hang" with pre-attached mounting hooks. 

Sizes:  12" by 12" or 18" by 18"

name: Flor Trukas Unframed Print
description:
Flor Trukas from the series Trukas By Isa Zapata™. Trukas is series of colorful and unique characters with positive messages; perfect to bring happiness and good vibes to any space.


Trukas is available as watercolor prints and giclee on canvas; signed by Isa Zapata.

Unframed Print 
Printed On Watercolor Paper
10"x10" with a 2" white border for a complete 12" by 12"
Signed by Isa Zapata
All unframed prints are shipped in a bend proof cardboard mailer.

Custom orders and framing are available upon request.

If you are choosing the SET OF 3 option, please make sure to write on the comments at checkout the names of the artwork you want to receive.

Please allow 7  business days for processing and delivery.

©Isa Zapata 2013

Lucca The Elephant from the series Trukas By Isa Zapata™. Trukas is series of colorful and unique characters with positive messages; perfect to bring happiness and good vibes to any space.


Trukas is available as watercolor prints and giclee on canvas; signed by Isa Zapata.

Unframed Print 
Printed On Watercolor Paper
10"x10" with a 2" white border for a complete 12" by 12"
Signed by Isa Zapata
All unframed prints are shipped in a bend proof cardboard mailer.

Custom orders and framing are available upon request.

If you are choosing the SET OF 3 option, please make sure to write on the comments at checkout the names of the artwork you want to receive.

Please allow 7  business days for processing and delivery.

©Isa Zapata 2013
Facebook.com/IsaZapataArtist
Twitter.com/IsaZapata

name: Limited Edition/The Lorena Oversized Viscose tee
description:
The Lorena Tee: 
Heart strokes with quote: “Be who you are..Say what you feel..Do what you love.. Believe in yourself..” Ultra-light over sized T-shirt made with Viscose, a rayon material that has a silky appearance and feel.

Color: Black
Fabric: Viscose
Made in the USA

Caring for your garment: 

To ensure the durability of our "Wearable Art" we recommend: 
Machine wash or Hand wash in warm water, gentle cycle 
Do not bleach
Lay flat to dry
Do not iron printed motif. 
Remember that you are wearing a unique piece of art and it deserves the best care. 

Please allow 7  business days for processing and delivery.

©Isa Zapata 2013
Facebook.com/IsaZapataArtist
Twitter.com/IsaZapata

name: Limited Edition/The Alex Shirt
description:
Why should your walls have all the fun? 

From canvas to clothing, Wearable ART is the newest way to feed your passion for fashion. 

All U Need is Love! The "Alex" tee is flowing with love and romance with a hand painted heart and the inspirational saying "Be who you are, Do what you love, Believe in Yourself" surrounding it.  Long sleeve. 

Color: White 
Fabric: 100%  Cotton 
Made in the USA

Caring for your garment: 

To ensure the durability of our "Wearable Art" we recommend: 
Machine wash or Hand wash in warm water, gentle cycle 
Do not bleach
Lay flat to dry
Do not iron printed motif. 
Remember that you are wearing a unique piece of art and it deserves the best care. 


Please allow 7  business days for processing and delivery.

©Isa Zapata 2013
Facebook.com/IsaZapataArtist
Twitter.com/IsaZapata

name: Limited Edition/The OM  Tee
description:
The Om (or Aum) sign is the main symbol of Hinduism.
For the Hindus & Buddhists, Om is the primordial sound, the first breath of creation, the vibration that ensures existence. Om sign signifies God, Creation, & the One-ness of all creation. 

Hand Painted
Color: White 
Fabric: 100%  Cotton 
Made in the USA

Caring for your garment: 

To ensure the durability of our "Wearable Art" we recommend: 
Machine wash or Hand wash in warm water, gentle cycle 
Do not bleach
Lay flat to dry
Do not iron printed motif. 
Remember that you are wearing a unique piece of art and it deserves the best care. 


Please allow 7  business days for processing and delivery.

©Isa Zapata 2013

name: Limited Edition Yellow Flower
description:
For those who like the fusion of art and high-quality fashion, we are introducing Isa Zapata Limited Edition T-shirts.   Just like you, each garment is an ORIGINAL, there are no two alike.  Limited Edition T-shirts are detailed and hand-painted with inspiring images and messages to brighten up your world. 

Caring for your garment: 

To ensure the durability of our "Wearable Art" we recommend:

name: Discovery Original Watercolor Painting
description:
Isa's new drawings reflects all her new self, free of limitations and self-imposed fears. 

This series consist of the following pieces: 

-Transmutation
-Discovery
-Transformation
-Wisdom (Sold)
-Believing
-Awakening

*Only 1 Painting Of Each In Existence*
*Frame not included*
*Custom framing is available*

Medium: Watercolor and ink on Arches 300g/m2 Watercolor paper
Size: 9" by 12"
This original piece comes along with a certificate of authenticity signed by Isa Zapata.

Please allow 7  business days for processing and delivery. Art ships in a special bubble mailer envelope which gives the piece full protection against damages.


©Isa Zapata 2013
Facebook.com/IsaZapataArtist
Twitter.com/IsaZapata

name: Living Our Dream Mixed Media On Canvas
description: Isa Zapata introduces a new series of paintings entitled “Paradise Garden”. "Paradise Garden" merges the colors and natural beauty of sunset in the lush, tropical oasis of Miami. In this series the background is a work of art on it's own, with reflecting hues of the sky and ocean on canvas. Whimsical flowers speak to the unique nature of life and true beauty. “Nature is perfect, every little single thing we see is just a piece of art, and I wan to reflect it on this series because at the end it’s only the little moments and little details that makes our heart happy.” Isa stated that: “This series is completely inspired by nature found in a garden, where we are all unique flowers, all interconnected and dancing to the rhythm on life.” Tittle: "Living Our Dream" Size: 30" by 48" Medium: Mixed media on canvas/ gallery wrap 1 1/2 This painting comes with a certificate of authenticity. This item is NOT available for international shipping. This item is available for pick up.

name: Cascading Sunset Mixed Media On Canvas
description: "Cascading Sunset" from the series "Windows To happiness™" This is an original mixed media painting featuring IZ signature texture. "Windows To Happiness™". These pieces are inspired by nature and simplicity with the intention to awaken the inner child of the viewer. Artist: Isa Zapata Title: "Cascading Sunset" Size: 24"by 36" Medium: Mixed Media on gallery wrap canvas Created on 2012 Copyrights are retained by the artist. A Certificate of Authenticity is issued with this original, one of a kind (OOAK) painting to ensure that you are receiving an authentic Isa Zapata piece. Each painting is professionally packaged and insured. SOLD

name: Festive Garden Original Painting
description: Isa Zapata introduces a new series of paintings entitled “Paradise Garden”. "Paradise Garden" merges the colors and natural beauty of sunset in the lush, tropical oasis of Miami. In this series the background is a work of art on it's own, with reflecting hues of the sky and ocean on canvas. Whimsical flowers speak to the unique nature of life and true beauty. “Nature is perfect, every little single thing we see is just a piece of art, and I wan to reflect it on this series because at the end it’s only the little moments and little details that makes our heart happy.” Isa stated that: “This series is completely inspired by nature found in a garden, where we are all unique flowers, all interconnected and dancing to the rhythm on life.” Tittle: Festive Garden Size: 18" by 24" Medium: Mixed media on canvas/ gallery wrap 1 1/2 This item is available for international shipping.

name: Prinsia Unframed Original Watercolor
description:
Which Goddess are you? You deserve the best and remember to celebrate the Goddess inside of you  everyday.

Prinsia: Bliss, serenity and wisdom fill your days and you are a natural healer. If you wear flowers in your hair, long flowing skirts and smile at the world, Prinsia, will infuse your spirit with PEACE. 

Medium: Watercolor and ink on Arches 300g/m2 Watercolor paper
Size: 9" by 12"
This original piece comes along with a certificate of authenticity signed by Isa Zapata.
Shipping and Handling: This piece will be shipped in a protected mailing tube. 
Please allow 7  business days for processing and delivery.

©Isa Zapata 2013
